channel.title: Fighting
channel.description:
ok as you all know i'm new and i am not pro at coding so maybe someone could explain me how could i make deltascape pk better i mean when someone hits you and u start to run and while u run he can't hit you he just follows so how could i make that he follows and hits you at same time? :confused:
***Sorry for bad explaining***

item.title: Fighting
item.dc:creator: @Backlash Backlash
item.description:
@Backlash wrote:

[quote=“rolkisssss, post:1, topic:261939”]ok as you all know i’m new and i am not pro at coding so maybe someone could explain me how could i make deltascape pk better i mean when someone hits you and u start to run and while u run he can’t hit you he just follows so how could i make that he follows and hits you at same time?

Basically unless you code it, you can’t fix it. Try 'RichScape, it’s noob-friendly (not saying you are one) and it’s also very glitch free.

                                                                                                         ***Sorry for bad explaining***[/quote]

Read full topic
